titles: Laudensium apostasia: or A dialogue in which is shewen, that some divines risen up in our church since the greatness of the late archbishop, are in sundry points of great moment, quite fallen off from the doctrine received in the Church of England. By Henry Hickman fellow of Magd. Colledg Oxon.
author: Hickman, Henry, d. 1692.
publisher: printed by D. Maxwell, for Sa. Gellibrand, at the sign of the Ball in St. Pauls Churchyard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Church of England --  Doctirnes --  Early works to 1800.
